title: Cath Lab Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: I attended two interviews for this position in which I met with managers and had peer interviews which I considered to be very beneficial in the process of choosing a new work place.
Interview Questions: What are my strengths/weaknesses? Why am I seeking employment here? What is my 1/5year plan?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: I felt comfortable with the process. The two people who interviewed me were professional & easy to talk to. We sat in the director's office around a small table. It made it feel as if it was more personal than cold & professional.
Interview Questions: I was asked regarding my job knowledge, questions regarding my likes and dislikes overall, questions whether I felt the job would be a good fit.

title: Certified Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: They were very professional. They made sure that i understood every question. They stopped after every section to see if i had any questions. At the end the showed me the pharmacy and explain every room to me. They do offer certification for IV, which is something i wish to do. Super excited
Interview Questions: What is a situation you found that was difficult for you?

title: Phlebotomy Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Brownwood, TX) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by three very sweet ladies in the lab, they not only made me feel right at home but took their time allowing me to answer questions and getting to know me a little. I never once felt uncomfortable nor "looked down upon" for any of my answers. The Lab Director Kay Shaw was extremely informative on what my duties would be as were Kim and Kellie. I left feeling confident in knowing that the group I would be working with, if hired, would be very professional and helpful in furthering my phlebotomy career here at Hendricks. I also left with the feeling that everyone there acted like a family unit, which I would love to become a part of.
Interview Questions: How would you handle confrontation in the work place?

title: Rehab Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: Face-to-face interaction with a senior PT at the clinic. Formal but easygoing, and every question asked was relevant. Not a lot of filler or formalities, so it only lasted about 15 minutes.
Interview Questions: How many hours per week do you want to work?

title: Nurse Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: I think the Nurse Tech interviews were planned out well and the process was productive and to the point. The questions were solid and important for them to know. I think the employers I interviewed with were all very welcoming and did a great job at making it a comfortable process.
Interview Questions: We have a lot of people that we interview, so what can you specifically bring to the team?

title: Certified Medical Assistant (CMA) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: Very straight to the point process, respectful and kind management, and an easy and fast process. Received an offer less than a few hours after the interview by Human Resources and accepted the offer.
Interview Questions: How do you handle stress?

title: Transportation Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2023
Interview Descriptions: The ladies were very nice and made me feel welcome. During the interview they made me feel comfortable and talked everything out with me so I can understand better about the job.
Interview Questions: How do I cope with customers if they were served the wrong item?

title: PCT Patient Care Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2023
Interview Descriptions: My interview with Mrs.Jennifer went quite well Mrs.Jennifer was and excellent advocate and very polite overall the interview was a success...Thanks kindly Mrs.Jennifer for giving me the opportunity to work well with others
Interview Questions: What are my expectations for the job I'm applying for?

title: Coder 1 Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Extremely positive interaction. The interviewer was easy to talk to and relatable. The job I was interviewing for was offered on the spot and the beginning process was and has been super easy.
Interview Questions: Would you be interested in paid classes for the opportunity for advancement?

title: Radiologic Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health
Interview Descriptions: Met with all supervisors of radiology. Was asked questions about myself in a very comfortable way. Was given in depth description of what to expect in my role. I was given a tour of the hospital
Interview Questions: How do you describe yourself

title: Emergency Room Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very relaxed and the nurse managers were very friendly and personable. They got to know me, and showed me around the facility and explained how things worked and what was expected.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work in the emergency setting?

title: PBX Operator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (North Abilene, TX) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: Very professional and very polite with all staff members. I would be working with on a daily basis. I would to see myself retire with this facility in years to com.
Interview Questions: I start January 30th 2023

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: First, the recruiter will schedule an interview between an applicant and the employer. There are two interviewers, one is the nurse manager and the other one is the nurse educator, and it is done via zoom.
Interview Questions: They will ask you a question like Tell me to about yourself and why you want to work for our company.

title: Registered Respiratory Therapist (RRT) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health
Interview Descriptions: They were very friendly and accommodating which made the interview process much easier and less nerve racking. I’m excited to start working there! The HR representative and supervisors are very professional and friendly.
Interview Questions: One of the questions I was asked was where I saw myself in 5 years and why I saw myself working at Hendrick.

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very professional and everyone made me feel welcome. I felt comfortable during the interview, and they asked me good questions. It was a great interview, and made me feel like I made the right choice of where to work.
Interview Questions: What made you want to work here?

title: Student Nurse Intern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Hendrick Health
Interview Descriptions: Short, multiple units were hiring and you talked to two. You got to pick your interests and then they would offer you an interview at two they believed best suited that. The interviewers were very personable.
Interview Questions: Why would you want to work on this unit?

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: In depth interview, very friendly and explained everything I would want and need to know. The woman in HR was also very friendly in letting me know the process before and after hiring!
Interview Questions: What would you say are your strengths?

title: Admissions Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview went very well, with manager explaining the responsibilities and needs of the position. We then discussed my experience and the fit for the job. Hours were discussed, as well as location of the job and ability to do it.
Interview Questions: What do you feel is most important for a hospital experience.

title: Admissions Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: The process was pretty simple. I had 2 interviewers that asked a set of about ten pre-determined questions. They were very nice. I was not nervous at all. It was relaxed. It took a total of fifteen to twenty minutes.
Interview Questions: What would your previous boss say about you?

title: Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is conducting in person interview and description of the job and what all is required too see if you are the best fit for the position.  You learn a little bit of each other to get a better understanding of each other.
Interview Questions: If a customer was to call and ask to speak directly to an manager or the Dr instead of speaking to you and they would not take no for an answer. How would you handle the call?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: everything was put in order, HR is very accommodating and answers questions timely. The Manager who interviews me was very friendly and discusses everything I asked, people are very organized, not difficulty in applying.
Interview Questions: personal questions, strengths and weaknesses, how do you deal stress while at work.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: I was escorted from the HR office to the floor, as we went along the floor, the interviewer showed me around the floor. we settled in her office and she interviewed me and then found 3 nurses to come and meet me.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work at Hendrick?

title: Cerified Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Brownwood, TX) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: The staff was kind and gave me all the information I needed. They gave me all the information of the job offer which was, Schedules, work uniform, etc. The staff gave me the run down about my training and everything I will learn to do in the future.
Interview Questions: Do I want to further my career

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very professional. I was interviewed twice. The first interview was with the manager and then I had a peer interview. They made me feel comfortable during the interview, and they allowed me to ask questions.
Interview Questions:
Q: Tell me about yourself.
Q: Where do you see yourself in 3-5 years?
Q: How do you respond to criticism?
Q: Why do you think you are fit for this position?
Q: Are you a leader or a follower?

title: Nurse Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a quick and easy process. They wanted to know more about me and why I wanted the job. The ladies that conducted my interview were very nice and made me feel welcomed.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work in Med-surge?

title: New Graduate RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: I applied, they processed my application, set up an interview time with me, scheduled my interview, I went to HR office, walked me to my interview on the scheduled date and time.
Interview Questions: My strengths and weaknesses, why I wanted to work on that unit.

title: Admitting Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very relaxed. Felt very comfortable with the supervisor. I felt the questions were fair. Felt the amount of time in the interview was accurate, never felt rushed.
Interview Questions: What are 3 words to describe yourself?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was quick, efficient, and everyone was very professional. Everyone was nice. I was lost a couple times and a couple people were more than happy to direct me where to go. This was definitely one of the best and smoothest interviews I have had.
Interview Questions: I got asked many questions about my experience, my expectations, how I work with others, and how I would enhance patient experiences. They also asked questions about me to get to know me.

title: PACS Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very straightforward and was full of information. I was given ample time to ask questions and was provided with plenty of feedback and encouraging discussion. The team truly showed me the unity of a healthcare focused unit.
Interview Questions: How do you handle challenging situations and conflicting personalities.

title: Volunteer Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: The two ladies who interviewed me were very thorough and kind during my interview.  They answered all my questions and made me feel very comfortable.  It was a relaxed interview yet very professional.
Interview Questions: If I was comfortable managing difficult situations.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: The whole interview process was a very pleasant experience. I received a tour of the facility, my potential job expectations were explained, and I enjoyed conversating with my potential manager.
Interview Questions: Describe your typical responsibilities at your Level Two NICU.

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions:
The process was 2 step in nature.  Phone initial interview/informative process, then an in person interview was scheduled in advance with input from me on best time and day, which worked well with my current work schedule.  Interviewer was timely on arrival and informative providing copious amount of information during the interview process..  This was very helpful for me to make a decision about joining the Hendrick team if an offer was provided to me.
I was able to speak to some of the current team members which allowed me to ascertain if current employees are fulfilled in their workplace and longevity of service.  This paints a good picture regarding what type of culture Hendricks promotes.
Interview Questions:
Working weekends occasionally bothered me.
If I am a nicotine user.

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Brownwood, TX) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview process went great! The two ladies that conducted my interview were very sweet and made me feel very comfortable! To my surprise they not only asked me questions pertaining to the job at hand but also about my home life, which was something very new to me but was reassuring in the sense that it let me know employees from Hendrick's really care!
Interview Questions: They asked me if I was nervous.

title: Certified Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Brownwood, TX) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Welcoming, respectful, organized. Relaxing. Always prompt in the contact process. Welcomed any questions and welcomed questions. Answered them right away and in detail.  The conversations over the phone were always professional but welcoming, always motivating.
Interview Questions: Please tell us about yourself?

title: Admitting Representative I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Chris performed my interview. She was very personable, thorough and made me feel comfortable through the interview process. There was another employee present that made the process kind of awkward but Chris being so personable offset the uneasy feeling.
Interview Questions: Why did I chose Hendricks for employement.

title: Radiology Support Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: I was able to meet with HR who then helped me to the Radiology department where I had my interview.  I met with three individuals within the department who all worked different jobs, and it was very helpful to have each member describe what was needed from my end to successfully and smoothly run our department.  The feedback was incredibly helpful and informative.
Interview Questions: Are you capable of multitasking? Speaking with patients in person, via the phone and inputting information in the system?

title: RN- Rehabilitation Hospital Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Telephone, TX) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: Was called from HR at HMC to set up a time for the interview and the Nurse Manager called me for interview which was  done over the phone at the time that was it was scheduled.
Interview Questions: About my nursing experience and skills

title: RN BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer was very professional, the questions were very appropriate and the feedback given was specific.  My questions were answered to my satisfaction and the interview process enabled me to anticipate to be a member of the unit.
Interview Questions: where  I see myself in few years time.

title: Registered Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: I appreciated that I was able to have my choice between  a phone interview or in person interview. I chose a phone interview, and it went well and didn’t take too long with some pretty standard questions. There was only one interview required for my position.
Interview Questions: Describe a time where you made a mistake at work and how you acted to fix it and improve.

title: Rehab Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: Great use of signage. Key on communication and very friendly staff. Kelly did a great job of showing and explain the job. Everyone I met was very friendly even with the space issue they have with the construction. Very great team of staff.
Interview Questions: Do you have your CPR CERTIFICATE

title: Certified Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Brownwood, TX) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: Interview process went great. Or, it seemed to. I was told that I “seem to be perfect for what they were looking for”, & “If you are willing to learn, you are in the right place”…  in both interviews.  Waited almost 2 weeks for HR to call me for next steps. When I was finally called, I was told they didn’t feel like they had the time for a new graduate. They knew initially I was a new graduate. God has plans for me. All glory to God.
Interview Questions: Will you be willing to learn and speak up if you do not know how to do some thing?

title: Medical Clerk Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Hendrick Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very easy and the director was very friendly to speak with and explained everything with the position in detail so there would be no confusion. She was ready and willing to answer any and all questions that there were without any problem
Interview Questions: I was asked if I was familiar with TDCJ and if so if I would not mind giving an overview of my knowledge.

title: Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Sweetwater, TX) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Excellent interview with the prospective employer. Kind staff with professional interview techniques. Quick response to inquiries. Thorough background check.  I was impressed with the process. I felt it was fair and appropriate.
Interview Questions: Reason for applying, job duties.

title: Biller/Collector Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth. I arrived and was led directly to the interviewer's office. In all honesty it felt more like a conversation than an interview. I have always preferred those interviews. It makes the job more relatable and attainable.
Interview Questions: Why are you leaving your current employer?

title: Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (North Abilene, TX) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: You are taken into the interview room and interviewed by 3 people.  The main person will ask all the necessary questions the other 2 are present to make sure nothing is missed.
Interview Questions: What is one thing I have done that shows I went above & beyond to help out a customer.

title: Licensed Vocational Nurse (LVN) Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Met with the Supervisor/Nurse Manager of the unit in her office. She asked me several questions and we discussed the position as well as expectations, job training plan, and whether I was interested in the position or not.
Interview Questions:
If there was only one thing I could know about you, what would that be?
What made you decide to be a nurse?

title: Security Officer I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: Arrived at HR. Member to me to Interviewing Manager making sure I arrived safely.  Interview was professional and relaxed at the same time. All parties had an appropriate demeanor interview was quick and thorough
Interview Questions: A belligerent and intoxicated patient with potential broken wrists was attempting to leave the hospital against medical advise.  The nurses ask you to stop the man, who is 6'5 300 LBS.  What would you do?

title: Medical Laboratory Technician I (MLT) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was a phone interview with the managers of the lab.  They were very friendly and easy to talk too.  They took the time to explain the job and hours, as well as what the lab looked like.
Interview Questions: What was my previous experience and what type of automation I was used to working on?

title: Phlebotomy Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Hendrick Health
Interview Descriptions: Very organized and professional, but in no way intimidating. It went very well and I'm hoping to receive a call sometime soon! He made me feel like I was a good fit and we discussed the different available schedules, pay, training, overtime, and how they give raises.
Interview Questions: What are some of your long term and short term goals?

title: Recruiter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very organized and timely. I received a call to interview, interviewed onsite within 5 days, and received an offer within 5 days after the interview. Everybody was extremely friendly and professional.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your experience recruiting.

title: Benefits Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Relaxed face to face interview for both. Information provided was from past, present and future of the system as a whole. All personnel was very knowledgeable in their respective positions and the position being interviewed for.
Interview Questions: How do you feel about public speaking?

title: Insurance Verification Specialist I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: My interview team was made up of the hiring manager and 2 cohorts from the department.  We met in the hiring managers office where we discussed the job responsibilities and asked and responded to questions on both sides.  At the end of the interview, I was given a brief tour of the office, at a high level due to security protocol.  It was a great experience: both professional and down to earth.
Interview Questions: Generally I was asked to describe myself, my skill set and why I wanted to be a part of the Hendrick Health Team.  I then was given an opportunity to ask questions of my own about the job and the company.

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: In-depth interview over the phone. Touched on many subjects regarding the position. Explained the position and requirements thoroughly. My questions about the position were answered. When interviewer concluded I was right for the position, I was informed that I would be contacted by HR. HR called me later in the day and an offer was made. I accepted the offer. HR explained the next processes from orientation and what documents needed to be turned in for employment purposes.  An appointment was made for an initial meeting and orientation date. My questions were answered as well.
Interview Questions: I was so nervous, I can not tell you what was asked because my mind is going blank.

title: Environmental Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Iinterview with The human resources manager :Monica and she was. Very nice to me and help me to got every thinks well done9

The interview was super easy.  They asked about very basic questions, like where you live, how you commute, and what your availability is. One question they asked was what you think good hospitality is.
Interview Questions: You will be ok with this position

title: Admitting Representative I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Brownwood, TX) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was extremely efficient and informative.  My interviewer was very thorough and welcomed any and all questions.  She made me feel at ease and therefore was able to put my best foot forward and walk away feeling successful in my presentation.
Interview Questions: What do you consider your strengths.

title: Residential Rehab Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Arrived at office approximately 15 minutes early and was greeted by the young lady who was over the interviewing for that position along with another young lady who also assisted in the interview and answering questions. They took me on a brief tour of the facility pointing out different things I’d be doing and where. They took their time with me and made sure to ask me if I had questions throughout the entire process. I felt very comfortable and relaxed the whole time.
Interview Questions:
If I had any experience in this field 
If I was ok working nights and rotating weekends

title: Admitting Representative I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Brownwood, TX) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very professional and relaxed atmosphere. Both representatives of the hospital allowed ample time for all parties to ask questions and make comments. Very informative line of questioning. The interviewers were very straightforward regarding their expectations of not on the position but the person fulfilling that position,
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in five years.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was very easy and they were very helpful. I was able to do a lot of the paper work at home. That made it very nice and everything was set up so you could understand everything.
Interview Questions: How long I have been a CNA

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process started with a phone interview with the head of the Physical  Therapy Department, followed by a second zoom call interview with the head of the department and two veteran Physical Therapists.
Interview Questions:
Greatest strengths/weaknesses
Questions about experiences in the field
Three words my friends would use to describe me
Last time I was afraid
What I am looking for in a job
Preferred work environment

title: Scheduling Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process for this Scheduling Representative position was one of the smoothest and comfortable experiences I have had since being in the working industry.  The interviewers were both very humbling to talk to while making me feel comfortable enough to no be nervous but to be myself.  This allowed both interviews to go very well. I truly appreciate the professionalism of the interviews.
Interview Questions: To tell them about myself.

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was so relaxed & very comfortable for me. I did not feel nervous or scared or like i was being judged in anyway. The interview was so relaxed we laughed together & still got through the interview process successfully.
Interview Questions: Why i was good for the position.

title: Insurance Benefits Verification Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer was very nice, so it made me feel at ease and comfortable answering the question. It did not feel like I am being grilled or interrogated. The questions were  very reasonable and appropriate.
Interview Questions: Was there a time you disagree with the procedure to accomplish a task?

title: Network Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: It's two step interview process with your immediate supervisor and then if you pass it you get a second interview with your immediate supervisor and a coworker and after that's done HR will continue to communicate with you along the process and it is easy to communicate with them and get the answers you need.
Interview Questions: What kind of background in computers do you have?

title: Scheduling Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted fast. The supervisor was super informative about the job. The questions asked wasn’t too bad. The employees were awesome once I got to meet them all. Overall great interview that I felt comfortable at.
Interview Questions: What is my goal working here

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was good. I was able to ask any questions and verify any information. I also had time to meet and greet some of my colleagues. Overall it was a seamless experience.
Interview Questions: Why I chose to apply to that particular unit.

title: RN Pacu Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: Hiring was quick and responsive. I applied online, got an email for interview schedule after a few days. The HR recruiter coordinated the interview and hiring process, with clear instructions for the job offer and post-offer screening.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself
Tell me what kind of a nurse you are.

title: Referral Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: I applied for this job on a Tuesday, was called for an interview later that day, interviewed Wednesday, and had a job offer, along with all the forms and info I would need on Friday. A very quick process, which was a huge relief. The interview wasn't very long, but I feel that everything that needed to be covered was.
Interview Questions: Name a time when you encountered a problem at work.

title: Nurse Aide II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: Apply, wait for an email for interviewing, due to COVID-19 have a virtual interview. Wait 3-5 days for a response. Get the response of denial or a proposal will be offered. Complete paper work etc.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little about yourself.

title: Medical Clerk Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: I was called for an interview appointment date, and time . I showed up 20 minutes early . Spoke to the manager. Everyone was kind and helpful. I was offered a position .
Interview Questions: Are you aware the medical department which you are applying for is in a maximum prison?

title: ACNO Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: Communication about the interview process and information needed was explained thoroughly which made the experience very efficient. Interviewed with my direct supervisor, peers and reporting staff.  All participants were welcoming and open with their questions.
Interview Questions: What can you bring to Hendrick?

title: Hospice Chaplain Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very professional process, with clear expectations and helpful guidance.  Each individual I encountered in the process was kind, helpful and enthusiastic about the possibility of my employment.  I am particularly grateful to the HR representative who provided some advocacy for me in the hiring process.
Interview Questions: All questions were appropriate for the position, including my ability to work with computers, my experience in dealing with crisis and conflict, and my ability to meet the physical and emotional aspects of the job.

title: Scheduling Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by phone to schedule a first interview. After the first interview, it was requested that I come back to meet with the front leads so they could ask any questions they might have had. Second interview ended up being a phone interview. The day after my phone interview, I was offered the position via telephone.
Interview Questions: What are your goals, if you are hired, in the first 30..60..90 days of employment?

title: Patient Transporter Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a one on one with a supervisor with straight forward questions I had to answer. Then I had to leave to take a computer test afterwards to get a score on my basic skills/knowledge.
Interview Questions: How would I handle situations with coworkers I don’t like/get along with.

title: Risk Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Initially I was interviewed by the Director of the department.  I was asked to return for a second interview with a group of employees with the department that I am applying for.
Interview Questions: What positive things would my co-workers say about me...

title: Mid-level Provider Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: I had the opportunity to spend time with my potential supervising physicians and administration. They were very kind and provided a professional environment to discuss my qualifications and interests in the job. I was able to observe their work in a first-person setting and enjoyed discussing the possibility of a job with the office and practice managers.
Interview Questions: What has attracted you to this area of work and what makes you want to make a change?

title: Security Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very professional. I felt comfortable throughout the entire interview process. It was like having a conversation with a close friend.  They asked questions about my work and life experiences.
Interview Questions: They asked me to tell them something about myself. They asked about my personal experiences. They asked why I would want the posted position, and why should they want to hire me.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX)
Interview Descriptions: Interview process; apply, get called for interview, go to interview, either get a call back with offer of an email politely stating they have chosen another candidate or politely do not want to move forward.
Interview Questions: In what ways would you benefit our team?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: I applied through a recruiter who was extremely helpful in getting to know me and keeping me updated on the process. I interviewed first over the phone with who would be my direct supervisor and we set the next steps for a site visit. When I arrived I met with HR about logistics and benefits and then went to the department to observe and follow some of the current employees. Then I had a peer interview following.
Interview Questions: Why did I want to make the change and move to Abilene and work for this hospital system

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: Thorough question asking about previous job history, experience, comfort with certain patients. Pay not discussed at the moment. Patient ratio, hours and shifts. Spoke about turn over rate. what are my strengths and weaknesses, how well do I work with others.
Interview Questions: How many years have you been a nurse?

title: Environmental Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was professional, yet extremely personal.  I felt very little pressure to perform and was able to freely answer and ask all questions without reservation.
Interview Questions: There wasn't really any difficult questions.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very efficient and enjoyable. I felt well prepared for what to expect during interviews with the nurse managers. There was clear communication about arrival times, appropriate dress and how the overall process would go.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work on this floor?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very professional and organized. My interviewer was friendly and helped me feel comfortable. I enjoyed the style of her interview. The process was in a timely manner.
Interview Questions: Name a strength and a weakness about your self?

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Lubbock, TX) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was great! It was brief and enjoyable. I had a peer interview where everyone was very friendly. They gave me an answer within a few days, not weeks like other companies.
Interview Questions: What is an example of how you dealth with conflict?

title: Environmental Services Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: Very professional, warm and welcoming. They truly care about who they bring to represent their company. They called and spoke on phone first, then I came in for a in person interview. And it was very informative and they were real professional and knowledgeable.
Interview Questions: What are my strengths/weaknesses? And they wanted to learn more about me and why I wanted to work there. Made me feel they care about me and that I was the right fit for them.

title: Part Time Compensation Assistant Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions:
1st Interview was completed by the manager looking for an assistant. Then two of the Human Resource employees interviewed together. Finally an interview with the HR Director. 

After discussion about the top candidates the applicant selected was notified and offered the position.
Interview Questions: How would you describe yourself in one word?

title: Environmental Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: I had a morning interview with the department manager.   He was quite friendly and explained all the job duities and their requirements.   He answered all my questions.  At the end of the interview he asked me to return at 4 PM for a second interview with the shift supervisor.    One of the best interviews I have ever had!!
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Sterile Processing Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very professional, yet personal enough to make me feel very comfortable. The interview focused on me at first, and then dove into the role I would be assuming in the offered position.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 2-5 years?

title: Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by the hiring manager and a peer group. I was asked questions regarding my experience with former employer,  the reason I left former employer and my work experience. In addition, I was asked to provide one strength and one weakness.
Interview Questions: To name one strength and one weakness

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview wasn’t as easy as I figured or as I am use to. The questions were what I’ve heard before but in a different form so I got confused here and there. Overall the interview went great, there were two very kind managers who both had their own set of questions. It was definitely a good positive environment and they made me feel welcomed.
Interview Questions: why did you choose to apply to Hendricks?

title: Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and received an offer for an interview. I was interviewed by two nice ladies who were genuine and actually cared about the process. I then went straight into a peer interview where all the ladies were fun and made me feel real comfortable.
Interview Questions: How would you treat confidentiality of medical history if someone you know came in?

title: Certified Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: The office manager took me to a back office and proceeded to ask interview questions. She was very personable and made me feel comfortable.  She provided time for me to ask questions or expand on anything I said.
Interview Questions: Tell me how you feel about a "no cell phone" policy during work hours.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: Jobs are posted on the company website. The person then selects which jobs they are interested in applying for. When the applicant selects the job the application pops up and the applicant applies directly to that job and can also attach their resume. Human Resources will then contact you for an interview if you qualify.
Interview Questions: How do you handle criticism?

title: Hospice RN Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: Well organized and informative and she asked all relevant questions related to the job I was applying for and was straightforward. I felt very welcomed during both 1:1 and peer interviews, which made the process way less intimidating.
Interview Questions: Why hospice?

title: Anesthesia Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was two parts and the process was professional, I interviewed with the manager of the department on the first and with the manager, director and on of the doctors in the second
Interview Questions: If I was up to the challenge of constant interaction with the other team members and Drs.

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: The Laboratory Manager interviewed me via Skype video call. She asked me about my self and what I do. She also asked me about my expectations. She introduced me about the nature of the Hospital I am going to be employed.
Interview Questions: What can you see 5 years from now?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: I met with a recruiter in the human resources department.  She took me to the floor to meet with the manager I interviewed with.  Jennifer Schmeckel from HR and Kim McCollough were both very helpful, warm, and friendly.
Interview Questions: What are my strengths

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very straight-forward and comforting. After applying, I got a call from HR to schedule the interview. I met with the nurse manager of the unit in a one-on-one meeting that lasted about 45 minutes. After the one-on-one, I went into a peer interview and spoke to the charge nurse and a few other registered nurses. It was an enjoyable interview overall, and they all made me feel welcomed and comfortable.
Interview Questions: What is one thing that I need to know about your learning style?

title: Telecommunications Operator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: Pleasant, professional,  and personal interview.   Scheduled face-to-face interview with the supervisor of the department.  She asked very fair and honest questions.  She introduced me to the other employees in that department to access if we would work well together as a "team".
Interview Questions: What positive attribute are you able to bring to this department.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was pretty straightforward. I showed up to HR a few minutes before my interview time and then I was escorted up to go meet with my nurse manager. It was a single individual interview. She asked me some questions and also allowed for me to ask questions of my own.
Interview Questions: Why I chose the particular unit that I applied for a position in

title: Materials Manager Buyer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: I had interview with the member who would be my immediate supervisor first and then was schedule for a peer interview the following week.  Immediate supervisor interview asked me to explain my background and asked me a few questions that he didn’t understand as I had a military career. The peer interview I felt was more to see if the woman in the office had specific questions about my abilities with excel, customers, pressure, etc. Overall my resume showcased a lot and then my opening remarks had filled in a lot of gaps. I mainly explained how my background made me the right fit.
Interview Questions: To explain my background and how I would fit into their office with my experience.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: When I walked into the building I was nervous, but once the interview started the interviewer made me feel comfortable and was helpful in answering my questions. The interview was nice and did not last long,
Interview Questions: What made you choose Hendrick Medical Center? Where do you see yourself in a few years? Tell me about yourself. Would you be willing to work on another unit?

title: Environmental Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: over all it was a very present experience. they were very calming and easy going. they asked questions and gave lots of tips and info about the job to make sure it was a good fit before proceeding.
Interview Questions: name a time you went above and beyond the call of duty to complete a task

title: RN, Bsn Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was not intimidating at all.  I felt at ease with the nurse manager and was able to have what I considered a laid back, but thorough interview with her.
Interview Questions: One question that was asked was why I wanted to become an employee in the operating room at Hendrick.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was formal but friendly.  It took awhile to get back with me after submitting the application but once I was contacted, scheduling moved fast.  The nurse manager was kind and easy to talk to on both floors. I interviewed on.
Interview Questions: Tell me a bit about yourself

title: Labor and Delivery RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: Absolutely loved the nurse manager and everything about this hospital! Felt like home and the people were so incredibly sweet. She asked me a variety of different questions but I felt it was more of a conservation between us. She then gave me a tour of the unit and then did a peer interview.
Interview Questions: Describe a time where you had to resolve conflict.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: After completing and submitting the application it was only a few days before they called to ask for interview. Interview was scheduled just a couple of days out, the HR dept and unit manager were very friendly and welcoming.
Interview Questions: What are some strengths and weaknesses that co-workers would say about you, if asked?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: I submitted my application on November. Unfortunately, I got caught up with all the holidays, I think. So, I was called for an interview on February. The first Inrterview was from the area's manager and supervisor, they are really nice. It actually went on just like a regular conversation.
Interview Questions: strengths and weaknesses, experiences and expectations.

title: Field Service Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: My interviewer(s) were outstandingly respectful and asked only questions of upmost relevance to the position I applied for. I was treated with respect and I felt that my interviewers truly listened to what i had to say and treated me as such.
Interview Questions: Can you name a moment in a past work environment when you had to deal with an upset customer/coworker?

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: Three assessments and an in person interview.  Lasted about an hour and fifteen minutes. Said they will make a decision within the next couple or weeks. Received information on benefits and pay information.
Interview Questions: What made you want to be a nurse?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by the unit manager, she is very nice. She was asking me questions base on my resume,  primarily about my work experience. She told me about the cases they usually handle in the floor and she showed me the entire unit.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your work experience? Do you have a lot of team work in your previous job.

title: Security Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions: They desired to learn about you as a person, not just job experiences. Questions related to Integrity, Loyalty, and Work Ethics where asked. They took time to learn who you were as a person to see if you would fit well with the team.
Interview Questions: At times patients will pass away, sometimes with no family to leave their belongings to, you may be required to inventory the items for lost and found purposes. You and a co-worker are inventorying the  deceased belongings and your coworker finds $10 in one dollar bills, he/she takes 6 of the single dollar bills and places them in his/her pocket and reports that only $4 dollars where int he belongs. How would you handle that situation? Expect role-play scenario.

title: Certified Registered Nurse Anesthetist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions:
Sent my resume to HR. 
Received a reply email. Resume sent to chief MDA.
Got and confirmation email that they wanted to interview in person.
Flew out from Florida.
Meet with HR.
Meet with chief MDA and a lead CRNA
Very informal.  Surprisingly not focused on if I was the right fit for the company.  Focused on whether the company was a right fit for me.
Given tour.
Shadowed a CRNA in OR.
Spoke with many other CRNA's working.
Ate in doctors lounge.
Given tour of community.
Take to dinner.
Interview Questions: I was not asked any questions

title: Specialty Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions: My interview was very professional and informative. I was explained to in detail the duties of the position and what all was to be expected of me if I were chosen for further employment consideration. The Human Resources staff are very kind, helpful and welcoming.
Interview Questions: What made you apply for this position?

title: Medical Laboratory Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions: The hiring manager contacted me initially, and then there was a peer interview. I think the interview went smoothly because they were so nice and I didn't feel rushed to answer a question. All my questions I had for them were answered honestly.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work in this specific area?

title: Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. I received a call for an interview in less than 1 week.  I interview and was called with an offer four days after the interview.  I was asked to take a typing test prior to the interview.  The interview was very cordial and concise.
Interview Questions: What were my short range goals.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: The manager was professional, pleasant and organized. She asked several questions and allowed sufficient time for answers .  A peer interview was also done on the same day with current staff members who were also professional, pleasant and courteous even though they were actively working; everyone made me feel welcome.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself?

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very good everyone was very nice id was a good process it did take as long as I thought it was going to  I enjoyed it the people were very nice
Interview Questions: How would a coworker describe you?

title: LVN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was good. I was asked to go ahead and do my peer interview while in office for my interview with the manager. They gave me time to ask questions that I had.
Interview Questions: What is your greatest asset?

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX)
Interview Descriptions: I met with the office manager, physician, and other mid-levels for breakfast and a casual Q&A session. I was then given a tour of the facility and was able to observe a surgical case. Lastly, I met with the HR department following my interview to discuss benefits.
Interview Questions: How does your current employer feel about you leaving?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Hendrick Health
Interview Descriptions: Within minutes of submitting my application I received a call from HR. I happened to still be in the building and was invited up for an interview. I was so impressed by how knowledgeable Stacy Kirk was about my position, job requirements, training and scheduling from what seemed like off the top of his head. He was friendly, encouraging and helpful.
Interview Questions: I was asked what sparked my interest in pursuing a career at hospice.

title: Cashier/Payment Poster Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: From the application process thru to my Job offer was very professional.  I enjoyed each step. I had a total of 3 interviews including a peer interview.  I found them all very professional and felt very respectful.
Interview Questions: Why should we hire you?

title: MRI Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was presented professionally and everyone was polite.  I felt very welcomed.  The panel asked important questions relating to my knowledge of MRI and CT.  I liked the interview process where I was introduced to managers, leads and the staff.
Interview Questions: Why I wanted to move to Texas?

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: They asked many in depth questions about my previous work history in the medical field. Overall I was very satisfied and would recommend anyone to come work for this establishment.
Interview Questions: They asked about what made me want to pursue a career in this line of work?

title: Emergency Department RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: Went very smooth. My communication with the HR rep was vital to my success. The manager in the ER was very quick to schedule my interview and conducted and very smooth interview.
Interview Questions:
Why do you want to be a nurse?
What motivates you?
Questions related to my experience on my resume and how i handled certain situations

title: Environmental Services Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: I went to hospital and when I got there, I had to call and have someone come take me to interview. I met with 3 people, they were friendly. I was comfortable the moment I met them. They asked me questions about myself and other things. I really I really enjoyed my interview.
Interview Questions: They asked me about jobs I have done.

title: Admissions Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: I was already employed as a physical therapist, and i was approached by my director about a job opportunity. Had a peer interview with my peers. Very inquisitive about me as a person.
Interview Questions: What are your goals?

title: Patient Sitter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: Had a great experience during interview process. Applied on day 1, got a call for interview the next day and will hear something by next week.  They were very friendly and very easy to talk to. Made you feel comfortable the entire process.
Interview Questions: Why should we choose you over the other candidates?

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Dec 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview and hiring process takes time. Initially went through 3 interviews. One on one, peer interview, and interview with VP. Generally about a month long with scheduling these interviews.
Interview Questions: Why this specific position?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: Fairly easy process. I applied online and two days later received a call for an interview with the recruiter. Very nice lady. Pretty typical interview process. Was offered a job.
Interview Questions: name a difficult  situation  and how you handled it

title: Sterile Processing Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX)
Interview Descriptions: The interview was short. just asked me about myself and if i am flexible to work any shift the questions were easy overall, then took me on a tour and showed me the department and talked more about the job and my duties
Interview Questions: te,ll me about yourself

title: Charge RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions:
On line application, exam and interview with HR and employer. Three to four days of educational training and IV therapy course. The environment was friendly and clean.

There were several videos and on line courses that were required to complete. 

One lunch period was required to have with department head and it was very welcoming .
Interview Questions: Past experience

title: RN Pacu Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX)
Interview Descriptions: I dropped off a resume  and was called for an interview. It went well- I was shown around and a few days later was offered the job.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Erie, PA) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed over the phone because I moved here from Pennsylvania. Easy process. Typical interview questions. Talked to the nurse manager for the unit as well as an HR person I believe.
Interview Questions: Previous experience, what qualities I have that could contribute to a team, etc. Normal interview questions.

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Hendrick Health (Abilene, TX) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: The interview process began with the online application; this can take time (1-2 weeks), then a call to schedule an interview with HR (there are usually several individuals in this room). More of establishing a rapport and culture fit. High emphasis on customer service, past experience, wiliness to learn was as a key point. Team work and past experience with difficult clients. Also, interviewee took notes as we spoke.
Interview Questions: Typical behavior questions "tell me about yourself" "tell me when you encountered a difficult situation and how did you handle it" "Why do you want this job" "what are qualities you like about this position"-- heavy emphasis on making a career not just looking for a job.
